metadata.synopsis: After attacking Ketheric on the Moonrise Rooftop, a tentacle tears through one of the towers and provides a hole that leads down into the mind flayer Colony. The party must follow Ketheric down there to continue the main quest, and this PAD should hint at that.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use the debugbook -> MOO quest flags and options -> either start the Assault on Moonrise/Audience with the Absolute and attack Ketheric on the rooftop of Moonrise Tower- Get Ketheric to leave to the Colony (killcombat or Ctrl+Shift+K Ketheric, keep attacking Ketheric if he's still invulnerable)- After the combat is over, a player will say this PAD after a few seconds, while still on the rooftop and not blocked from talking

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That thing came from below. We need to find out where it took Ketheric.
